sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"男人的，男性的"之意。
means: masculine ： 指有男子特征的，阳刚的。用于形容女性时，含轻蔑意味。
male ： 单纯指男性或雄性。
manly ： 指适合男子的、有男子汉气慨的。

sentence.Network_en: The army is still one of the last male bastions.
sentence.Network_cn: 军队仍然是男人占据的最后堡垒之一。

sentence.Network_en: We were in the same college, which was male-only at that time.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们那时在同一所学院，当时只招男生。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French masle, from Latin masculus, from mas 'a male'

entry.def: Someone who is male is a man or a boy.

example.ex: Many women achievers appear to pose a threat to their male colleagues...
example.tran: 许多事业有成的女性似乎对她们的男同事构成了一种威胁。

example.ex: The London City Ballet has engaged two male dancers from the Bolshoi...
example.tran: 伦敦市芭蕾舞团从波修瓦芭蕾舞团聘来了两名男舞蹈演员。

entry.def: Men and boys are sometimes referred to as males when they are being considered as a type.

example.ex: ...the remains of a Caucasian male, aged 65-70...
example.tran: 65岁至70岁之间的白人男性的遗骸

example.ex: He was very anxious to prove he was a red-blooded male...
example.tran: 他急于证明自己是一名热血男儿。

entry.def: Male means relating, belonging, or affecting men rather than women.

example.ex: The rate of male unemployment in Britain is now the third worst in Europe.
example.tran: 英国男性的失业率目前高居欧洲第三位。

entry.def: You can refer to any creature that belongs to the sex that cannot lay eggs or have babies as a male .

example.ex: Males and females take turns brooding the eggs.

entry.def: A male flower or plant fertilizes the part that will become the fruit.

means.word_mean: 1. an animal that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that can fertilize female gametes (ova)
2. a person who belongs to the sex that cannot have babies
1. being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation;
2. for or composed of men or boys;

auth_sentence.content: The Knights were all male, weren't they?

Sentence.sentence: They also own more businesses,launch more start-ups(新创办的企业),and more often work in traditionally male fields.

Confronted with such facts,some Swedish activists and legislators are demanding more extreme and far-reaching measures, such as replacing male and female pronouns with a neutral alternative and monitoring children more closely to correct them when they gravitate(被吸引) toward gendered play
For example, if a little boy's male friends are punished for crying, he will learn that "boys don't cry.

sentences.cn: 男人, 男孩都是男性。

means.word_mean: 男人; 雄性动物; 雄性植物

sentences.en: The males are often larger than the females.
sentences.cn: 雄性动物常比雌性动物大。
